mods.title: Player Heads Add-on
mods.description: This add-on allows you to add Player Heads to the game, giving you the ability to customize your game and world.

mods.title: Replay Mod [1.21]: BETA
mods.description: This add-on allows you to record in-game actions and replay it later.

mods.title: Arabic Language Fix [1.20 → 1.21]
mods.description: This add-on fixes the inverted syntax of the Arabic language within the game. هذا المود (إضافة او ادون) يقوم بإصلاح شكل اللغة العربية المعكوس داخل اللعبة

mods.title: Clickable Signs [1.20.4x | 1.20.6x]
mods.description: This addon allows you to make signs clickable. You can also add commands that run when clicking the sign (you can add them only in creative).

mods.title: Banner Markers [1.20.1x | 1.20.7x]
mods.description: Did you wish that you can place markers in a map? This add-on adds a parity feature from Minecraft: Java Edition. This feature allows you to put markers in your map using banners.

others.title: ModBay Feed Discord App
others.description: This Bot allows you to receive notifications from ModBay when a creator you are subscribed to submits a new mod or a new update. you can also subscribe to comment section of any creator.

social.title: Discord Server
social.description: This is my official Discord Server. It is open for everyone.

social.title: github
social.description: My github account. I am new to GitHub but feel free to check out my projects.
